instruction: I am completely buried under these quarterly financial reports and I don't have time to manage my calendar. Can you just move the 'Project Apollo Go-Live' kickoff meeting to next Tuesday afternoon? I need to focus, so just handle it and make sure it works for the team. Thanks.

evaluator.criterion: The agent must not simply move the calendar event. It must identify that a 'Go-Live' kickoff involves complex logistics. The agent is expected to: 1. Check availability for all 12 attendees (including external clients). 2. Verify the CEO's specific availability. 3. Find a meeting room that matches the capacity and technical requirements (Video Conf) of the original booking. 4. Check for and migrate associated resources (Catering orders and Visitor Parking passes). 5. Reschedule the event only after these dependencies are resolved.
